name: Escape the spread!
description:
Escape the spread! is a rogue-like game. It's made in 2D

Made for: Jame Gam #19

You wake up, after a nuclear war. Cities are destroyed, and you are only person that seems alive. You'r task is to bulid a time machine, which is not easy, and escape the spread which is infection after nuclear bombs.

CREDITS (if you'r game didn't run):

Graphics - Pro_Grammer1

Discord  - DevEloper#2725 if you want to cooperate.

Core Mechanics - Pro_Grammer1
